title: The Kizuna Archive
description: A website for a Chicago-based commemoration project for the 2011 earthquake and tsunami in Japan, remembering the victims of disaster and documenting the region's recovery

title: The Lord of the Rings Website
description: A fun responsive website that uses Jquery to document thee adventure in The Lord of the Rings

title: Startup Matchmaker
description: Using HTML and CSS flexbox to imitate the layout of the Startup Matchmaker webpage, a website that helps you find the perfect match for your startup.
